name: momentum-rider-fullstack
description: Full-stack development setup for Momentum Rider

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npx playwright install
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.test:unit: cd server && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.test:coverage: cd server && npm run test:coverage && cd ../frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:watch: cd server && npm run test:watch & cd frontend && npm run test:watch
scripts.test:smoke: cd server && npm test && cd frontend && npm test tests/integration/portfolio-service.test.ts
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format

author: Momentum Rider Team
